title: Will Gaming Subscriptions Do More Harm Than Good? w/ Gary Whitta - Kinda Funny Xcast Ep. 147
description:
Go to http://liquidiv.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get 20% off. 

Mike and Gary sit down for a one on one podcast to discuss Gary's obsession with Diablo 4, awesome upcoming indie games, the new Xbox Game Pass Core, and more. Then Gary answers a community question regarding gaming subscriptions and how they could harm the games industry similar to what we are seeing take place in Hollywood with entertainment industry.

01:04:24 - Friends and Family Game Pass Test will Conclude in Aug
01:06:22 - The Acquisition Continues…

01:13:44 - July Game Pass Update!
